results.title: Silent Myocardial Infarction: A Case Report
results.text_hl: Based on other identified risk factors, including high BMI, @<m>DISEASE_Prediabetic_State</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011236 @@@prediabetes@@@, primary @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@, @DISEASE_Hypercholesterolemia @DISEASE_MESH:D006937 @@@hypercholesterolemia@@@, and @DISEASE_Herpes_Zoster @DISEASE_MESH:D006562 @@@HZ@@@, the @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ was advised to continue with @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ 20 mg daily, prescribed @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@ 80 mg daily, and was educated about maintaining a healthy diet, exercise, and receiving the shingles vaccination.

citations.NLM: Kolesova MV, Minor S. Silent Myocardial Infarction: A Case Report Cureus. 2023 Aug;15(8):e43906. PMID: 37638270
